title: Disable MLB Skill
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has signed into & setup the client app, Alexa
AND user has enabled the MLB Skill
AND account is linked to MLB.com account
AND the user is in the Alexa app
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on 'Disable' button on the app
OR invokes Alexa with the intent to disable: ie. 'Alexa disable the MLB skill'
Expected Result
custom_expected:
THEN the 'Disable' button is replaced by the 'Enable Skill' button in the app
AND if the user had a linked account, the account is now unlinked

title: Open MLB Skill when Disabled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has disabled the MLB skill on the Alexa app
AND the user is in the Alexa app
custom_steps:
WHEN the user makes an intent to launch the MLB skil: 
i.e. 
- Open MLB
- Launch MLB
custom_expected:
THEN Alexa responds with:
- If you've already enabled MLB say "Open MLB". Otherwise, first say, "Enable MLB skill."
- This skill is not enabled. To enable it say "Enable MLB.com Gameday Audio Skill."
